text: Transgender activist Caitlyn Jenner escorted her constant companion Sophia Hutchins to a sushi meal at Nobu Malibu on Sunday in her $ 200K purple Porsche. At 68, the thrice - divorced father - of - six is 46 years older than the Pepperdine University senior, but the pair have been nearly inseparable as far back as June 2017. The two - time Olympic gold medalist dressed her 6ft2in figure in a white floral bomber with matching skinny jeans and brown - suede booties.
